channel.title: How to change the PVP points prices on 525 Hybrid pvp?
channel.description: Hey, I am trying to change the chaotic items pk points value, and I have no idea how to in a 525 server. They are current 1000 pvp points, i need them to be 500. Thanks for your help. ;D ;D Owner owwch.

item.title: How to change the PVP points prices on 525 Hybrid pvp?
item.dc:creator: @sosodeaf sosodeaf
item.description:
@sosodeaf wrote:

Lol easy just go to item assistant i think and search for item code thats in there and it should come somthing like this:
case (item ID);
return (pkpoints);
Copy and paste in then add the item to the shop.
